org.apache.cassandra.repair

Class RemoteSyncTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<SyncStat>
      • org.apache.cassandra.repair.SyncTask
        • org.apache.cassandra.repair.RemoteSyncTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<SyncStat>, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<SyncStat>

    public class RemoteSyncTask
extends SyncTask
    RemoteSyncTask sends SyncRequest to remote(non-coordinator) node to repair(stream) data with other replica. When RemoteSyncTask receives SyncComplete from remote node, task completes.
